data.message: Hi eminem im lexi im 17 and i live in Columbia sc and i write and i really would like u to have or read my story and my songs i write its on my bucket list to meet u for one day and do what ever u want to do but i have a hard life and ive just wish i could share it with you  one day i know i can relate to u and i think u could relate to me but i dont know that i just hear your music and i love it its like your singing my whole life or like i wrote the song that why i kinda want u to read mine one day i just need to find out how to give them to u
